name: Sightless (kaakas)
description:
Headphone required!

W,S-Move
A,D-Rotate
E-Right Hand/Interact
Q-Left Hand/Interact

Sightless is a dungeoncrawler with lot of items,enemies and bosses in plan. The twist from the average dungeoncrawlers that in this game you, the player is blind.
You can only trust your hearing and your feeling of touch. Wander blind in these dungeons while fighting foes and looting treasures while searching for the descend portal...but be aware of time, dont wander for too long...or your fate catches up to you.
